r.s: Generates puzzle pieces from image file
r.d:
PEAR::Image_Puzzle divides an image to puzzle pieces.
* Provides a few edge styles to generate puzzle pieces
* Allow saving each piece to separate files
* Allow getting information about each piece coordinates accoring to original image
r.n:
- changed saving files to proper file type according to given extension
- checking if type supports transparent colour
- fixed saving gif by limiting number of coulour to 256
